attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a General Election As Soon As Possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the public in general need to decide who should be deselected not politicians.
a general election is needed as soon as possible to restore some public faith in our politicians and more importantly the democratic process within this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
